primary.context: Caller wanted to know what to do with their rental agreement
primary.detail: The agent offered to send the link and asked 'anything else' but never confirmed the link was actually sent.

steps: Caller asked for instructions on rental agreement.
Agent performed account lookup via caller ID.
Agent verified caller name and state.
Agent explained the rental agreement purpose.
Agent offered to send a link to the agreement.
Caller accepted, but agent moved to closing without confirming the send action.

impediment.detail: Agent failed to trigger or confirm the link delivery before ending the call.

agent_issue.detail: Agent asked 'is there anything else' and ended the call without confirming the requested link was actually sent.

actions.detail: Agent prepared link but never confirmed sending

insights.summary: The caller wanted instructions on submitting a rental agreement. The agent verified the caller and offered a link, but ended the call without confirming the link was sent.
insights.verbatim: Would you like a link sent to your email and phone so you can complete the agreement online?
insights.coaching: The agent must confirm the delivery of the link (e.g., 'I have sent that link now') before asking if there is anything else and closing the call.
